testsuite.name: SimpleBankSystemTest

testcase.name: start

failure.message:
java.lang.AssertionError: Wrong answer in test #6
The user should be signed in after entering the correct card information.
Please find below the output of your program during this failed test. Note that the '>' character indicates the beginning of the input line.
---
Arguments: -fileName card.s3db
1. Create an account 2. Log into account 0. Exit > 1 4000005501625561 4162 1. Create an account 2. Log into account 0. Exit > 2
Enter your card number: >> 4000005501625561 Enter your PIN: > 4162
Wrong card number or PIN!
1. Create an account 2. Log into account 0. Exit
